content.description: Let f be the function defined by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msqrt> <mi>x</mi> </msqrt> <mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext> </mtext><mi>f</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>r</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A46@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, where k is a positive constant.
content.question: Find f'(x) and f''(x).

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
